A supersized Pumpkaboo evolves into a supersized _____. Its bodily proportions also get passed on to its descendants.
Supersized _____ aren’t picky. They will forcefully drag anyone off to the afterlife.
A large-sized Pumpkaboo evolves into a large-sized _____. Its bodily proportions also get passed on to its descendants.
Large _____ put on the guise of adults, taking the hands of children to lead them to the afterlife.
A small-sized Pumpkaboo evolves into a small-sized _____. Its bodily proportions also get passed on to its descendants.
Small _____ pretend to be children to fool adults. Anyone who falls for the act gets carried away to the hereafter.
In the darkness of a new-moon night, _____ will come knocking. Whoever answers the door will be swept off to the afterlife.
Eerie cries emanate from its body in the dead of night. The sounds are said to be the wails of spirits who are suffering in the afterlife.
It enwraps its prey in its hairlike arms. It sings joyfully as it observes the suffering of its prey.
Singing in eerie voices, they wander town streets on the night of the new moon. Anyone who hears their song is cursed.
